snippet: An influential official from North Korea left for China on Monday to discuss building joint industrial complexes on their borders, the North’s state-run Korean Central News Agency reported.
lead_paragraph: An influential official from North Korea left for China on Monday to discuss building joint industrial complexes on their borders, the North’s state-run Korean Central News Agency reported.

headline.main: North Korea Reported to Be Pursuing Industrial Project With China
headline.print_headline: North Korea Reported to Be Pursuing Industrial Project With China
